{{title|iter_move{{small|(ranges::chunk_view::''inner-iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
friend constexpr auto iter_move( const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; i ) noexcept(/* see below */)
}}

Returns the result of applying {{lc|ranges::iter_move}} to the stored inner iterator.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to the enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}, and {{c|*i.parent_-&gt;current_}} denote the cached underlying iterator of type {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|return ranges::iter_move(*i.parent_-&gt;current_);}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|chunk_view::''inner-iterator''}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|iterator}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The result of applying {{c|ranges::iter_move}} to the stored iterator of type {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;}}.

===Exceptions===
{{noexcept|noexcept(ranges::iter_move(*i.parent_-&gt;current_))}}
